Class AeToQueryVariableContext

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.jaxen.VariableContext
public class AeToQueryVariableContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jaxen.VariableContext

Implements a Jaxen variable context using the copy operation context for variable resolution.
